_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The qualities of a faithful disciple who: The Buddha is my Teacher, I am his disciple
The Buddha knows, I do not know
The Teacher’s instructions are nourishing and nutritious
Gladly, let only skin, sinews, and bones remain!
Let the flesh and blood waste away in my body!
I will not relax my energy until I have achieved what is possible by human strength, energy, and vigor.
